CamTCC323.First Lines: Penaunce is in herte reusingein monye tellinge…
CamTCC323.Last Lines:
…þu is god þat neuer ne leiÞer is ioye þat
                    neuer [ ? ]
CamTCC323.Note:
Ten lines (sic Person), written in 6 lines: four at bottom of
                    col. 1 and two in the middle of col. 2, written two lines of verse per line of
                    MS.
CamTCC323.Editions:
Person,  Henry Axel. 
             Cambridge Middle English Lyrics.
         Seattle: University of Washington Press, 1953; rev. ed. 1962: 26-7.
